scripts.start: start "rex-mongod" mongod && start "rex-nodemon" nodemon ./out/server.js && start "rex-tsc" tsc --watch
scripts.stop: taskkill /FI "WINDOWTITLE eq rex-mongod*" && taskkill /FI "WINDOWTITLE eq rex-nodemon*" && taskkill /FI "WINDOWTITLE eq rex-tsc*"
scripts.test: start "rex-mongod" mongod && mocha --requre ts-node/register "./out/tests/**/*.js" && taskkill /FI "WINDOWTITLE eq rex-mongod*" > NUL || taskkill /FI "WINDOWTITLE eq rex-mongod*" > NUL
